channel.title: Research on SDN-Cloudstack - Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Research on SDN-Cloudstack - Documentation

item.title: Research SNMP
item.description: This files is composed of all the test done during the primary research for the SDN CloudStack project. MIBs (Management Information Base) used CISCO-VLAN-IFTABLE-RELATIONSHIP-MIB.my CISCO-VLAN-MEMBERSHIP-MIB.my CISCO-VTP-MIB.my All those MIBs can be found from the maker FTP in accordance with the following notice : https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/lan/catalyst3750/software/release/12-2_44_se/configuration/guide/scg/swmibs.pdf Raw data The raw data where stored inside .txt files, under the CSV format. Formatted data The data are then shaped with Excel. The formul to get the final ID is = RIGHT(A3,LEN(A3) - SEARCH(".

item.title: Research Hugo
item.description: In the folowing part, we will see the test we made on hugo to make it work and create that web-site. (Warning the syntax might change a bit depending on the theme you use) Creating the hugo-web-site Making an hugo-web-site is quite easy, once you had download hugo on your server. You need to run : hugo new site {site_name} That should give you something like that : 3105-alpine-1:/home/hugo/presentation# hugo new site presentation Congratulations!
